title: The new Boeing 787-8 is now available for Microsoft Flight Simulator.
description:
In this video, we will explore the new addition to MSFS: the Boeing 787-8. Although it still requires some finishing touches, it already shows great potential. Please note that ownership of the Boeing 787-10 from Microsoft/Asobo is necessary to utilize this new aircraft, owing to its dependencies.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/64y8zHVG2uY
